captcha.success: Thanks for joining **{{guild}}**! You have now gained access to the server.
captcha.failed: Oh no! You failed the verification stage. Please try again.
captcha.timedout: Oh no! You failed! Next time, be a little faster.
captcha.wrongCode: Oh no! You sent me the wrong captcha. Please try again.
captcha.dmDisabled: Oh no! Your DMs are disabled.
captcha.roleInvalid: Oh no! I couldn't find the verification role. Please contact a staff member.
captcha.description: Please type the captcha below to be able to access **{{guild}}**.
captcha.notes:
1. Type out the traced colored characters from left to right.
2. Ignore the decoy characters spread-around.
3. You don't have to respect characters cases (upper/lower case)!
captcha.instructions:
Welcome to **{{guild}}**! To gain access to the server, you need to complete the captcha verification.

**Instructions:**
1. Type the traced colored characters from left to right.
2. Ignore the decoy characters spread around.
3. You don't need to respect character cases (uppercase/lowercase).

**Attempts:** You have a maximum of {{maxAttempts}} attempts to complete the verification.
**Failed Attempts:** {{attempts}}/{{maxAttempts}}
captcha.kickWarning: You will be kicked in 1 minute if you do not complete the verification.
captcha.failedDescription:
You entered the wrong captcha. Please try again.

**Failed Attempts:** {{attempts}}/{{maxAttempts}}

membercount.configDesc:
Select which configuration slot you want to edit.

**Available placeholders for custom messages:**
- {user}, {users}: Total members (includes bots)
- {member}, {members}: Human members
- {bot}, {bots}: Bots
- {online}, {idle}, {dnd}, {offline}: Members by status
- {onlinemember}, {idlemember}, {dndmember}, {offlinemember}: Humans by status
- {allonline}, {allonlinemember}: Members/humans with visible presence
- {role}, {roles}: Number of roles
- {channel}, {channels}: Total channels
- {text}, {texts}: Text channels
- {voice}, {voices}: Voice channels
- {stage}, {stages}: Stages
- {thread}, {threads}: Threads
- {news}: Announcement channels
- {category}, {parent}: Categories
- {openthread}, {openthreads}: Open threads
- {archivedthread}, {archivedthreads}: Archived threads

Example: `{members} members | {online} online`
